definition: solution (to a math problem)/method of solving
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]

sentences.english: The numerical method for the inverse problem of second-dimensional advection-dispersion-reaction equations is discussed in the article.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一類二維對流反應擴散方程反問題的數值解法。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is feasible to directly electrolytic produce low-titanium aluminium alloys in practice.
sentences.chinese: 因此電解法生產低鈦鋁合金在實際上也是可行的。

sentences.english: The solution of Finite Element Method and Rigid Bar Method calculating foundation pressure is adopted on the pier pilebox foundation.
sentences.chinese: 用有限單元鏈杆解法，計算墩樁箱形基礎地基反力。

sentences.english: In this paper, based on the model's mathematical structure, we propose an elementary solution method.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種基於模型結構的初等數學解法。

sentences.english: It can be shown that this recursive solution takes exponential time to run.
sentences.chinese: 可以證明，這種遞歸解法需要耗費指數級的時間。

sentences.english: Results Cardano indeed does not give the general solution of that problem.
sentences.chinese: 結果卡爾達諾確實沒有給出該問題的一般解法。

sentences.english: And we will post the model solutions.
sentences.chinese: 我們將貼出模型的解法。

sentences.english: The Graphic Methodintroduced in the paper is easy for students to master.
sentences.chinese: 用本文敘述的圖解法作剪力圖和彎矩圖學生易於掌握。

sentences.english: Cold fusion has been investigated by the electrolytical method and the deuterium absorption method.
sentences.chinese: 採用電解法和氘氣吸附法研究了冷聚變現象。

sentences.english: The application of the model and the algorithm to the water log control system in Four Lake Area has got satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 模型和解法在四湖地區應用，得到了滿意成果。

sentences.english: Finally it gives the method to solve the equation of orbital curve intersecting meridian at fixed angle.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了與子午線交定角的軌線方程的解法。

sentences.english: Besides, the theoretical stages of extraction and distillation columns of this two solvents are compared by graphic method.
sentences.chinese: 用圖解法比較萃取塔及蒸餾塔的理論級數。

sentences.english: To end it, the graphic method and analytic method to reconstruct the original shape of an axonometric stereo projection have been given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了軸測體視投影復原的圖解法和解析法。

sentences.english: The matrix method of solving diphantine equations and congruence expressions is developed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出了線性不定方程組與線性同餘式組的新矩陣解法。

sentences.english: A diagrammatic method is employed to compute shock absorber force at compression stroke.
sentences.chinese: 提出了計算壓縮行程減振器阻力的圖解法。

definition: completing the square (method of solving quadratic equation, math.)
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
elimination (math)/to eliminate one variable from equations
